job.title: Site Reliability Engineer - Quip
job.description:
Products and Technology
At Quip, we have built an amazing new way for teams to collaborate, communicate, and make decisions, whether you're three friends in an office, or one of the largest companies on the planet with tens of thousands of employees at all corners of the globe. Our Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) team makes sure that Quip is delightfully fast, always available for our customers whenever they need it, and well-insulated from outages or unpleasant surprises.
We never lose sight of one of our guiding principles: you cannot meet these goals at the expense of the health and happiness of the team working on them. Maintaining a healthy and supportive work environment, good work-life balance, and encouraging technical and professional growth for team members is as of much a core value for us as having top-notch operational standards.
Our team focuses on keeping our product running smoothly, consistently, and without repetitive manual work (toil). We know we have a keen product, and a fantastic place to work, and we're looking for some great people to join our SRE team to keep everything that way!
Skills and technologies you'd use (and learn or improve!) here:
Things we're looking for in people who we want to join us:
